card_text: Each time a monster(s) is Special Summoned that is a "Yubel" monster or mentions "Yubel", place 1 Chronicle Counter on this card. You can remove Chronicle Counters from your field to activate 1 of these effects;$N●1: Special Summon 1 "Yubel" from your GY.$N●2: Add 1 of your banished cards to your hand.$N●3: Banish 1 card from your Deck.$N●4: Destroy 1 card on the field.$N●5: Add 1 "Super Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.$NYou can only use this effect of "Mature Chronicle" once per turn.
